title: Kevin Rue-Albrecht
text:
I am a computational biologist and biomedical data science trainer at the University of Oxford, with a focus on functional genomics, transcriptomics, and single-cell sequencing technologies.
I actively develop solutions for interactive data visualisation and research software engineering to advance biological discovery. I am an active contributor to the Bioconductor project, developing and maintaining R packages for the community. My academic research explores the host immune response to infectious diseases, inflammation, and self-antigens.
